website_summaries.verdict: This highly-adjustable, thickened steel lock fits tires from 18.5 to 30 centimeters.
pros: Cannot be broken by hydraulic pliers
Violent attempts to remove lock will set off a car alarm if you have one
cons: Will not keep a rimless tire from rolling

customer_reviews.title: While you're traveling
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and put into service that day on a 15" tire. It is an awesome product: heavy duty, easy to use, will be difficult to break. The added security is comforting while we travel with our 4'x6' trailer. Came with two keys, but without the keys would be hard to pick the lock. The price was right too. Just saying that it is difficult to find security products used to keep coupled trailer to car/truck secured. We considered heavy duty cable wrapped around the trailer axle and connected to the car axle, but that would require scrambling around on pavement. The Coocheer is much easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: C. M-R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, but has slop between holes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but has slop between holes. Would expect some but the locking holes need to be closer together. If your really concerned and have room in your rims, cut proof chain and cut proof lock are the best. Wrap chain on rear wheel over spring shackle, thru rim, lock behind tire. If vehicle is moved, will rip the entire rear end out of the vehicle. Much better this method on pick up trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar F. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was better than I imagined when I received it.This car wheel lock is really heavy and of good quality. I tried it out right after I got it. The operation is very simple, I get started quickly. It is also very safe and convenient to carry .In addition,the customer service is good, very patient and immediately . Good value for money.I will also recommend it to my friends if they need it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: I keep my brand new boat trailer on the side of my workshop in an industrial area of town. My boat is safe on a high and dry near the water, but my trailer just sits there as an easy target for any thief. Put this bad boy on there and I’m no longer worried about it. They can definitely get it off with a sawzall or a sledge hammer, but that amount of noise will definitely get neighbors in the surrounding shops wondering what the hell is going on.
customer_reviews.author: Abilene

customer_reviews.title: Looks  good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate it. Locked it on rim thought the fingers should go thru the spokes. But are to short so they fit loose. It might wedge itself between the rims bead and the ground. I can move it round the rim lock on it.
customer_reviews.author: out mudding

customer_reviews.title: Won't stop a thief!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. It could easily be cut through with a cordless grinder. Locking pin is very short. Mine arrived all scratched and dinged up. Will not easily fit full sized tire. You must have an open wheel for this to possibly work.
customer_reviews.author: Goodman & Son's Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Lawn mower protector.
customer_reviews.text: I use this device on my riding lawn mower so that it won't get stolen. So far it is working. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: kincade

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product, but the color faints so fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my flatbed trailer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my flatbed trailer. Thieves can lift and chain a light trailer like mine even with a tongue lock. Not with this wheel lock! Beats the old fashioned way of chaining my wheels
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: The price is very affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have two trailers this is how I locked them up
customer_reviews.author: Dean F.

customer_reviews.title: Without a rim to hold in will roll around easily in kayak trailer tire
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing! Without a rim to hold in will roll around easily in kayak trailer tire. Friend drive trailer without realizing it was attached no stoppage on trailer except noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

product_meta.title: COOCHEER Car Wheel Lock,Anti Theft Tire Lock Clamp Boot Tire Claw Parking Car Truck RV Boat Trailer
feature_bullets: ►HEAVY DUTY STEEL: Made of heavy-duty Thickened steel, Anti voilent unlock, Even hydraulic pliers can not break it,High safety. Covered by High quality rust-resistant coating which is absolutely durable, not easy to color-fading or paint-shedding

►ANTI-THEFT LOCK CYLINDER: With high anti-theft performance Brass rocket lock cylinder, Anti-rust, Waterproof ,Can prevent your car from a various of lockpicks, Anti saw off, anti pry open and technical unlock

►ADJUSTABLE AND PRACTICAL: With movable lock arm, the width of this car wheel lock can adjustable from 18.5cm-30cm. Wheel lock tightly lock the tire and rim, Voilent unlock will activate the car's alarm systerm. Perfectly protect your vehicle
►SPECIAL DESIGN: Heavy gauge steel with a built in chock prevents trailer rollaway. Red front end PVC cover will prevents scratch or damage on wheels or rims

►EASY INSTALLATION AND WIDELY USED: This upgraded car wheel lock can be easily locked with key without align to the lock holes which is so convenient and quick. Fit Most Vehicles Including; Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, ATV's, RV's, Golf Carts, Small Aircraft, Boat Trailers, Scooters, Go Karts, Lawn Mowers, Widely used for various vehicles less than 30cm -wide tires
